description: A dashboard to monitor the realraum hackerspace

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp as t,
  any(total_member_count) as `Members`
FROM
  stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(t)
GROUP BY
  t
ORDER BY
  t

SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    any(state_open) as `State`
FROM stats

WHERE $__timeFilter(t)

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

WITH
  JSONExtractRaw(any(json), 'state') as state,
  JSONExtractRaw(state, 'icon') as icon
SELECT
  JSONExtractBool(state, 'open') ? JSONExtractString(icon, 'open') : JSONExtractString(icon, 'closed') as url,
  timestamp as t
FROM
  stats
WHERE $__timeFilter(t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t desc
LIMIT 1

SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    toUInt64(any(state_lastchange)) * 1000 as `Last Change` -- grafana and everything is shit (timezones)
FROM stats

WHERE $__timeFilter(t)

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    any(JSONExtractString(json, 'message')) as `Message`
FROM stats

WHERE $__timeFilter(t)

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

SELECT
  t,
  description,
  any(value) as Value
FROM
(
SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    arrayJoin(any(door_contact)) as doors,
    JSONExtractString(doors, 'description') as description,
    JSONExtractBool(doors, 'value') as value
FROM stats
WHERE $__timeFilter(t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
)
GROUP BY t, description
ORDER BY t

SELECT
  t,
  description,
  any(value) as Value
FROM
(
SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    arrayJoin(any(door_locked)) as doors,
    JSONExtractString(doors, 'description') as description,
    JSONExtractBool(doors, 'value') as value
FROM stats
WHERE $__timeFilter(t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
)
GROUP BY t, description
ORDER BY t

SELECT
    t,
    (arrayJoin(arrayZip(names, values)) as x).1 as name,
    any(x.2) as Value
FROM
(
SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'name'), any(temperature)) as names,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractFloat(x, 'value'), any(temperature)) as values,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'timestamp'), any(temperature)) as timestamps,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'unit'), any(temperature)) as untis
FROM stats
WHERE $__timeFilter(t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
)
WHERE name = '$temperature_sensors'
GROUP BY t, name
ORDER BY t

SELECT
    t,
    (arrayJoin(arrayZip(names, values)) as x).1 as name,
    any(x.2) as Value
FROM
(
SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'name'), any(temperature)) as names,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractFloat(x, 'value'), any(temperature)) as values,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'timestamp'), any(temperature)) as timestamps,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'unit'), any(temperature)) as untis
FROM stats
WHERE $__timeFilter(t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
)
GROUP BY t, name
ORDER BY t

SELECT
    t,
    (arrayJoin(arrayZip(names, values)) as x).1 as name,
    any(x.2) as Value
FROM
(
SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'name'), any(humidity)) as names,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractFloat(x, 'value'), any(humidity)) as values,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'timestamp'), any(humidity)) as timestamps,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'unit'), any(humidity)) as untis
FROM stats
WHERE $__timeFilter(t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
)
GROUP BY t, name
ORDER BY t

SELECT
    t,
    (arrayJoin(arrayZip(names, values)) as x).1 as name,
    any(x.2) as Value
FROM
(
SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'name'), any(voltage)) as names,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractFloat(x, 'value'), any(voltage)) as values,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'timestamp'), any(voltage)) as timestamps,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'unit'), any(voltage)) as untis
FROM stats
WHERE $__timeFilter(t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
)
GROUP BY t, name
ORDER BY t

SELECT
    t,
    (arrayJoin(arrayZip(names, values)) as x).1 as name,
    any(x.2) as Value
FROM
(
SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'name'), any(barometer)) as names,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractFloat(x, 'value'), any(barometer)) as values,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'timestamp'), any(barometer)) as timestamps,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'unit'), any(barometer)) as untis
FROM stats
WHERE $__timeFilter(t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
)
GROUP BY t, name
ORDER BY t

SELECT
    t,
    (arrayJoin(arrayZip(names, values)) as x).1 as name,
    any(x.2) as Value
FROM
(
SELECT
    timestamp as t,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'name'), any(illumination)) as names,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractFloat(x, 'value'), any(illumination)) as values,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'timestamp'), any(illumination)) as timestamps,
    arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'unit'), any(illumination)) as untis
FROM stats
WHERE $__timeFilter(t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
)
GROUP BY t, name
ORDER BY t

list.definition:
SELECT
  description
FROM
(
SELECT
    arrayJoin(argMax(door_contact, timestamp)) as doors,
    JSONExtractString(doors, 'description') as description,
    JSONExtractBool(doors, 'value') as value
FROM stats
)
GROUP BY description
list.label: Türkontakt
list.name: door_contact

list.definition:
SELECT
  arrayJoin(arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'name'), any(temperature))) as names
FROM stats
list.name: temperature_sensors
list.query:
SELECT
  arrayJoin(arrayMap(x -> JSONExtractString(x, 'name'), any(temperature))) as names
FROM stats

title: Realraum
